md:
giải nghĩa từ "environments" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Environments:
	+ Noun: Môi trường (từ loại: danh từ)
	+ Meaning: The natural world around us, including the air, water, land, and living things.
	+ Example sentence: "The company is committed to reducing its impact on the environments."
	+ Related words: ecosystem, nature, habitat, conservation.

* Environments:
	+ Noun: Cài đặt (từ loại: danh từ)
	+ Meaning: The settings or conditions in which a system, application, or process operates.
	+ Example sentence: "The developer needs to test the software in different environments to ensure its compatibility."
	+ Related words: setup, configuration, platform, deployment.

* Environments:
	+ Noun: Môi trường học tập (từ loại: danh từ)
	+ Meaning: The physical or psychological setting in which learning takes place.
	+ Example sentence: "The teacher creates a supportive environments for students to learn and grow."
	+ Related words: classroom, education, pedagogy, instruction.

Note: The meanings and example sentences are provided in English, and the translations are in Vietnamese.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "environments" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Environments:

    • Noun: Môi trường (từ loại: danh từ)
    • Meaning: The natural world around us, including the air, water, land, and living things.
    • Example sentence: "The company is committed to reducing its impact on the environments."
    • Related words: ecosystem, nature, habitat, conservation.

  • Environments:

    • Noun: Cài đặt (từ loại: danh từ)
    • Meaning: The settings or conditions in which a system, application, or process operates.
    • Example sentence: "The developer needs to test the software in different environments to ensure its compatibility."
    • Related words: setup, configuration, platform, deployment.

  • Environments:

    • Noun: Môi trường học tập (từ loại: danh từ)
    • Meaning: The physical or psychological setting in which learning takes place.
    • Example sentence: "The teacher creates a supportive environments for students to learn and grow."
    • Related words: classroom, education, pedagogy, instruction.

Note: The meanings and example sentences are provided in English, and the translations are in Vietnamese.
